EmailTemplate.description: FREE WEBINAR – Get up to speed with QuickBooks Online in 30 mins
EmailTemplate.name: Awareness Test - Free Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: FREE WEBINAR – Get up to speed with QuickBooks Online in 30 mins
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Get up to speed with QuickBooks Online in no time
View this email in your browser
Get up-to-speed in 30 minutes
We understand one of your small business clients has subscribed to QuickBooks Online and has invited you to help them with their books. We also understand that you may not know much about QuickBooks Online at this point – and we want to help.
Our free 30-minute Introduction to QuickBooks Online webinar will get you up-to-speed quickly on:
The benefits of cloud accounting How to get around QuickBooks Online The key features like bank feeds, payroll and more Along with how your clients can save time on-the-go
Why attend?
By investing a little time now, you’ll be more informed and productive when it’s time to help your client with their books - and saving time is what cloud accounting is all about.
Find a date that suits you
If you would prefer to get an overview from a team member now, please call us on 1800 618 521 and we’ll gladly help you out.
Thanks!
QuickBooks Online ProAdvisor Team
